New Records: Nicholas Pooran scored a career-best 67 runs in the match
West Indies won the match by 8 wickets and 7 balls to spare
India scored 152 runs in their innings
West Indies achieved a two-wicket win
Key Match Events: West Indies experienced an early collapse losing three wickets for 32 runs in the first 3.4 overs
Nicholas Pooran and Rovman Powell formed a crucial 57-run partnership
Akeal Hosein and Alzarri Joseph secured the win with key contributions in the final overs
Tilak Varma hit his maiden T20I fifty for India
Pre-Game Insights: India won the toss and chose to bat first
The match was played under steaming sunshine with over 2000 fans in attendance
Post-Match Reflections: West Indies are now 2-0 up in the five-match series
The third T20I will be played on Tuesday, August 8th
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was held at the Guyana National Stadium, Providence
The West Indies seamers used cutters and slower balls effectively
Others: The victory was a significant achievement for the West Indies team
Hardik Pandya was the pick of the Indian bowlers with 3-35 from his four overs
